description: A passionate full-stack developer creating innovative web applications

bio.intro: Currently studying in VIT Chennai pursuing BTech Electronics Computer Engineering, 2nd year I'm a passionate full-stack developer who loves creating innovative web applications and exploring cutting-edge technologies.
bio.tagline: Building the future, one line of code at a time
bio.aboutMe: With a strong foundation in modern web technologies, I enjoy turning ideas into reality through clean, efficient code. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and tackle challenging problems.
bio.currentFocus: Currently focusing on React, Next.js, and modern web development practices.

experience.title: BreatheEasy
experience.description: Created a generative web AI application which gives medicinal advice based on collected data using external hardware for chronic disease monitoring.

experience.title: Computer Vision Developer
experience.description: Created an interactive Doom game controlled entirely through hand tracking gestures using computer vision techniques.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experience.company: CNN Model for Plant Disease Detection
experience.description: Designed and implemented a Convolutional Neural Network model for detecting bad leaf spots in plants, achieving 94% accuracy.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed a real-time face detection attendance system with database integration and admin dashboard for educational institutions.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Built a responsive business website from scratch using core web technologies, focusing on clean design and optimal user experience.

experience.title: OCR Developer
experience.description: Developed an Optical Character Recognition system for extracting and digitizing text from images and scanned documents with 92% accuracy.

featured.name: BreatheEasy
featured.description: AI-powered healthcare application for chronic disease monitoring with IoT integration and real-time health analytics.
featured.longDescription: A comprehensive healthcare solution that combines IoT sensors, machine learning, and web technologies to monitor chronic diseases. Features real-time data collection, predictive analytics, and personalized health recommendations.

featured.name: Hand-Controlled Doom
featured.description: Interactive gaming experience using computer vision and hand tracking technology to control classic Doom gameplay.
featured.longDescription: Revolutionary gaming interface that transforms hand gestures into game controls. Uses MediaPipe for real-time hand tracking and custom gesture recognition algorithms.

featured.name: Plant Disease Detection
featured.description: CNN-based machine learning model for identifying plant diseases from leaf images with 94% accuracy.
featured.longDescription: Deep learning solution for agricultural applications using convolutional neural networks to detect various plant diseases. Includes web interface for farmers and gardeners.

featured.name: Face Recognition Attendance
featured.description: Real-time face detection and recognition system for automated attendance management in educational institutions.
featured.longDescription: Comprehensive attendance management solution with facial recognition, admin dashboard, student management, and detailed reporting features.

recentActivity.summary: In the last 90 days, I pushed 45 commits, opened 8 PRs, reviewed 12 PRs, and made 23 comments in public repositories.
